Title: Cold Mountain
Actors: Jude Law, Nicole Kidman, Renée Zellweger, Eileen Atkins
Plot: This Civil War saga addresses romance, friendship, and the ravages of war--both in the field and on the home front. Captures the horrors of war for both those fighting it, and for those left behind. This is a tale of hope, longing, redemption, second chances, and faith.
Production: Cattleya, Miramax Films, Bona Fide Productions, Mirage Enterprises
